title: Rihanna: Style Diary
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Rihanna: Style Diary Raise your hand if you have a playful fashion sense. The leader of the Rihanna Navy turned 29 on Feb. 20, 2017 and we're taking a look at her 'Good Girl' gone red carpet icon style evolution. Post to Facebook Rihanna: Style Diary Raise your hand if you have a playful fashion sense. The leader of the Rihanna Navy turned 29 on Feb. 20, 2017 and we're taking a look at her 'Good Girl' gone red carpet icon style evolution. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Rihanna: Style Diary None Raise your hand if you have a playful fashion sense. The leader of the Rihanna Navy turned 29 on Feb. 20, 2017 and we're taking a look at her 'Good Girl' gone red carpet icon style evolution. PAUL BUCK, EPA None Rihanna donned a familiar silhouette for the Grammys on Feb. 12, 2017. The sparkly bra top and billowing skirt are by Armani Privé. Dan MacMedan-USA TODAY NETWORK None Rihanna wore striped, wide-legged trousers and a low-cut shirt to the 'Man Aware' event held by the Barbados National HIV/AIDS Commission on Dec. 1, 2016 in Bridgetown, Barbados. Chris Jackson, Getty Images None Rocking a top celebrating the life of late rapper Tupac, Rihanna stepped out in Manhattan on Oct. 04, 2016. Josiah Kamau, BuzzFoto via Getty Images None Rih-Rih wore a white, Dior dress with shoulder cut-outs and embellishments to the Christian Dior show during Paris Fashion Week on Sept. 30, 2016 in Paris, France. Pascal Le Segretain, Getty Images for Dior None Naturally, Rihanna's paired her Fenty x Puma cherry blossom pink ensemble with a fan on a pearl strap. Pascal Le Segretain, Getty Images for Fenty x Puma None Rihanna's lips touch Drake's when he presents her The Video Vanguard Award during the MTV Video Music Awards at Madison Square Garden on Aug. 28, 2016. She wore a belted ballgown by Alexandre Vauthier for the occasion. Michael Loccisano, Getty Images None She went vintage for the Billboard Awards on May 22, 2016, wearing a coffee-colored dress by Thierry Mugler and Manolo Blahnik heels. NINA PROMMER, EPA None Rihanna's coat adds elegance to her blue button-down shirt and white shorts by Miu Miu at BET Black Girls Rock! 2016 at New Jersey Performing Arts Center on April 1, 2016. Gilbert Carrasquillo, FilmMagic None Rihanna's layered lavender look at the Brit Awards in Greenwich, London on Feb. 24, 2016 comes courtesy of Armani Privé Haute Couture. ANDREW COWIE, EPA None She donned pointed-toe, red sneakers and a floral gown with thigh-high slit to the MusiCares Person of the Year honoring Lionel Richie at the Los Angeles Convention Center on Feb. 13, 2016. Larry Busacca, Getty Images for NARAS None Rihanna's champagne Christian Dior Couture look bubbled over on the red caret at the 2nd Annual Diamond Ball on Dec. 10, 2015 in Santa Monica. Alberto E. Rodriguez, Getty Images None Rihanna wore a muted coral coat and over-the-knee black boots to Christian Dior's Spring-Summer 2016 ready-to-wear fashion collection during the Paris Fashion Week on Oct. 2, 2015. Thibault Camus, AP None She donned a pink off-the-shoulder Vivienne Westwood Red Label minidress on Aug. 31, 2015 in New York City. Josiah Kamau, BuzzFoto via Getty Images None She sported an A-Line denim dress by Dior to the presentation of the Fall/Winter 2015/16 Ready to Wear collection of Dior in Tokyo, Japan on June 16, 2015. CHRISTOPHER JUE, EPA None Her street style is equally as fascinating as her red carpet wear. She wears camouflage pants and matching jacket when leaving the Bowery Hotel in New York on May 15, 2015. Josiah Kamau, BuzzFoto via Getty Images None The singer wore a sunny, couture number by Guo Pei to the Met Gala on May 4, 2015 and launched 1,000 memes. Charles Sykes/Invision/AP None Rihanna wore a strapless, flamingo-pink number by Giambattista Valli to the Grammys on Feb. 8, 2015. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None Rihanna wore a garnet-colored form-fitting look by Zac Posen to the First Annual Diamond Ball at The Vineyard on Dec. 11, 2014 in Beverly Hills. Jon Kopaloff, FilmMagic None Rihanna opted for a black, two-piece with sheer skirt at the American Music Awards on Nov. 23, 2014 in Los Angeles. Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP None Rihanna donned a white Tom Ford number with jeweled cups at the 2014 amfAR LA Inspiration Gala at Milk Studios on Oct. 29, 2014 in Hollywood. Jon Kopaloff, FilmMagic None She wore a bifurcated ensemble by Stella McCartney to the Met Gala on May 5, 2014, in New York. Evan Agostini/Invision/AP None She showed some leg in a cream, see-through robe and bodysuit at the MTV Movie Awards on April 13, 2014 in Los Angeles. Christopher Polk, Getty Images for MTV None She gave us 'Pulp Fiction's' Mia Wallace vibes in a red, quarter-length coat, knee-high stockings and blunt bob at Dior's ready-to-wear fall/winter 2014-2015 fashion collection presented in Paris on Feb. 28, 2014. Thibault Camus, AP None Rihanna wore a canary yellow wrap dress to the Pre-GRAMMY Gala and Salute to Industry Icons event on Jan. 25, 2014 in Los Angeles. Kevin Mazur, WireImage None Rih-Rih looked breathtaking at the Grammys on Feb. 10, 2013 in a red Alaia gown with a sheer bodice. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None Rihanna, being so fashion forward, opted to skip the ugly Christmas sweater and donned sleek navy and grey stripes to turn on the Christmas Lights at Westfield Stratford City on Nov. 19, 2012 in London. Tim Whitby, Getty Images None She wore a halter gown with high slit by Adam Selman to the 'Battleship' premiere in Los Angeles on May 10, 2012. Chris Pizzello, AP None Rihanna wore a fuchsia, strapless Marchesa ballgown to the 'TIME' 100 gala on April 24, 2012 in New York. Evan Agostini, AP None Rihanna's bejeweled design accessorized with full-length gloves at the Brit Awards on Feb. 21, 2012 in London came courtesy of Givenchy Haute Couture. Jonathan Short, AP None Rihanna loves a halter dress. The floor-length frock she wore to the Grammys on Feb. 10, 2012 was an Armani. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None At the previous year's Grammys on Feb. 11, 2011, Rihanna rocked a sheer, off-the-shoulder Jean Paul Gaultier gown. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None She sported a whimsical, one-armed jumpsuit by D&G to Drai's Hollywood on July 21, 2010. Christopher Polk, Getty Images for Drai's Hollywoo None Rihanna wore a teal jumpsuit by Alexandre Vauthier to the Echo Awards on March 4, 2010 in Berlin, Germany. Andreas Rentz, Getty Images None Rihanna wore an intricate Elie Saab design with feathers and ruching to the Grammy Awards on Jan. 31, 2010. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None On Feb. 10, 2008, Rihanna wore a vibrant knee-high dress by Zac Posen to the Grammys in Los Angeles. Dan MacMedan, USA TODAY None She wore a revealing jade Roberto Cavalli design to the Grammy Awards on Feb. 11, 2007 in Los Angeles. Dan MacMedan, USAT Like this topic?
